title: "Brain Stimulation Can Rewire and Heal Damaged Neural Connections, But it Isn't Clear How"
excerpt: "We believe that neurostimulation has the potential to not only treat symptoms but also cure a wider range of diseases by repairing damaged connections. However, it has been unclear how to best fine-tune stimulation to specifically target damaged connections within the brain."
